dict.string: Turn WiFi On/Off + Get IP And Network Name

DEVICE=$(networksetup -listallhardwareports | grep -A 2 -E "AirPort|Wi-Fi" | grep -m 1 -o -e en[0-9]);
if [[ "{query}" == "off" ]] then networksetup -setairportpower $DEVICE Off elif [[ "{query}" == "on" ]] then networksetup -setairportpower $DEVICE On else echo "{query}" | pbcopy fi
